item.title: Of inquiry directing the Attorney General to provide certain documents in his possession to the House of Representatives relating to the October 4, 2021 memorandum issued by the Attorney General entitled "Partnership Among Federal, State, Local, Tribal, and Territorial Law Enforcement to Address Threats Against School Administrators, Board Members, Teachers, and Staff".

latestAction.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 105.

item.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 106.
Reported adversely (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 117-486.
Reported adversely (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 117-486.
Ordered to be Reported Unfavorably (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 20 - 18.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

summary.text: This resolution requests that the President provide the House of Representatives with documents and other communications concerning a specified memorandum issued by the Department of Justice entitled Partnership Among Federal, State, Local, Tribal, and Territorial Law Enforcement to Address Threats Against School Administrators, Board Members, Teachers, and Staff and related materials.

This resolution requests that the President provide the House of Representatives with documents and other communications concerning a specified memorandum issued by the Department of Justice entitled Partnership Among Federal, State, Local, Tribal, and Territorial Law Enforcement to Address Threats Against School Administrators, Board Members, Teachers, and Staff, including specific threats and other related materials.

bill.title: Of inquiry requesting the President to provide certain documents to the House of Representatives relating to the October 4, 2021 memorandum issued by the Attorney General entitled "Partnership Among Federal, State, Local, Tribal, and Territorial Law Enforcement to Address Threats Against School Administrators, Board Members, Teachers, and Staff".

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
